ARABIC: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'There is nothing more than our first death. We will not be raised up a second time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is no dying for us but once; and we shall not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: “This is our first and only death, and we shall never be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: After we die, we shall never be raised to life again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “There is nothing except our dying just once, and we will not be raised.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There is nothing but our first death, and we shall not be resurrected."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There is naught but our first death and we shall not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: There is nothing but our first death; we shall not be revived.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is naught but our first death, and we shall not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: there is nothing beyond our first death; we shall not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: There is naught but our first death, and we shall not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘It will be only our first death, and we shall not be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There is nothing beyond our first death, and we shall not be raised again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There is nothing but our first death, and we shall not be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There is nothing except the first death, we shall never be revived.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “There is nothing but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:35] ‘It, that death after which there is life, is nothing more than our first death, that is, when they were spermdrops, and we shall not be resurrected, [we shall not be] raised alive after the second one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: There is) in our life (naught but our first death, and we shall not be raised again) and we shall not be 577 brought back to life after we die.
